triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: MetaGPT builds upon LLMs as the foundation for multi-agent collaboration and intelligent problem-solving.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper addresses improvements to existing multi-agent systems by encoding human workflows to reduce hallucinations.

triples.name: Hallucination (artificial intelligence)
triples.relevance: MetaGPT specifically addresses the problem of cascading hallucinations in LLM chains through its SOP-based framework.

triples.name: Prompt engineering
triples.relevance: The paper uses prompt sequences and structured prompts as a key mechanism to guide agent behavior and reduce errors.

triples.name: Software engineering
triples.relevance: MetaGPT is evaluated on collaborative software engineering benchmarks to demonstrate its effectiveness in complex task solving.

triples.name: Assembly line
triples.relevance: MetaGPT proposes an assembly line paradigm for organizing multi-agent workflows where diverse roles are assigned to agents.
